title: Map of trade patterns, Britain and cotton

content.prompt: The trade patterns shown on the map above depict

choices.label: British imports of raw cotton and exports of finished cotton in the 1850s
major slave trading routes in the nineteenth century
alternate trade routes that developed as a result of the disruption caused by the Napoleonic Wars
routes that developed in response to the building of railroads in North America
illicit drug routes that developed in the second half of the twentieth century

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
